Program Overview

The leads generation and sales conversion course provides a deep understanding of the core principles, strategies, and proven techniques necessary for generating high-quality leads and maximizing sales conversions. This course covers a wide range of topics, including lead magnets, landing pages, sales funnels, email marketing, social media advertising, and conversion rate optimization. With this well-rounded knowledge base, participants will acquire the skills necessary to excel in the exciting field of lead generation and sales conversion.

  • Lead magnets

  • Email marketing

  • Landing pages

  • Lead nurturing

  • Social media marketing

  • Sales Funnel

  • Creating Offers

  • Content marketing for leads generation

  • Target audiences

  • Paid Advertising

  • Lead generation metrics

LIFE AS A LEADS GENERATION AND SALES CONVERSION EXPERT

The life of a lead generation and sales conversion expert is dynamic, challenging, and rewarding. These professionals possess a unique set of skills and knowledge to drive business growth and increase revenue. They are responsible for identifying potential leads, nurturing relationships, and ultimately converting prospects into paying customers.

The day-to-day routine of a lead generation and sales conversion expert revolves around researching and identifying target markets and key decision-makers within those markets. They utilize various tools and strategies such as data analysis, market research, and digital marketing techniques to generate leads and capture valuable customer information. This process requires continuous learning and adaptability to stay ahead in the ever-evolving business landscape.

Once leads are acquired, the expert focuses on nurturing relationships through effective communication, relationship-building tactics, and personalized marketing strategies. They engage with potential customers through channels like emails, phone calls, social media, and networking events. Building trust and providing value to prospects is crucial in converting leads into sales.

The expert also collaborates closely with the sales team, providing them with qualified leads and valuable insights to enhance the sales process. They work together to understand customer needs, overcome objections, and tailor solutions that meet the prospects’ requirements. Effective coordination and teamwork are essential in achieving sales targets and maximizing conversion rates.

Continuous analysis of sales data and performance metrics is an integral part of the lead generation and sales conversion expert’s role. They monitor key performance indicators, identify areas for improvement, and refine their strategies accordingly. Staying up to date with the latest trends and technologies in lead generation and sales enable them to employ innovative approaches and stay ahead of the competition.

Overall, the life of a lead generation and sales conversion expert involves a constant pursuit of new opportunities, strategic planning, relationship building, and data-driven decision-making. It requires a deep understanding of target markets, competitive landscapes, and customer behavior. It also demands strong communication and persuasive skills to effectively engage with prospects, identify their needs, and present compelling solutions. 

Additionally, it requires continuous adaptation to evolving trends and technologies, staying updated on industry best practices, and implementing innovative approaches to maximize conversion rates.

Career Advantages

High demand

In today's competitive business landscape, companies of all sizes recognize the importance of generating quality leads and converting them into customers. As a result, there is a consistently high demand for skilled lead generation and sales conversion experts. This demand ensures a steady stream of job opportunities and career growth prospects.

Versatility and Transferable Skills

The skills acquired as a lead generation and sales conversion expert are highly transferable across industries. The ability to understand target markets, identify potential customers, and effectively communicate and persuade are valuable skills that can be applied in various sales and marketing roles. This versatility provides professionals with diverse career options and the flexibility to explore different industries and sectors.

Impact on Business Growth

Lead generation and sales conversion experts play a critical role in driving business growth and revenue generation. Their ability to generate quality leads and convert them into paying customers directly impacts the bottom line of an organization. This influence on business outcomes not only increases job significance but also enhances career prospects and opens doors to higher-level positions with greater responsibilities.

Data-Driven Decision-Making

Lead generation and sales conversion experts rely heavily on data analysis and insights to drive their strategies and decision-making processes. By leveraging data, professionals in this field can make informed choices, optimize their campaigns, and improve conversion rates. This emphasis on data-driven decision-making not only enhances their effectiveness but also equips them with analytical skills that are highly valued across industries.

Networking and Relationship Building

Lead generation and sales conversion experts often work closely with various stakeholders, including potential clients, marketing teams, and sales representatives. This collaborative environment provides ample opportunities to build relationships and expand professional networks. Strong networking skills can lead to valuable connections, mentorship opportunities, and referrals that can accelerate career growth. In summary, a career in lead generation and sales conversion offers an exciting and rewarding career path for individuals passionate about sales, marketing, and driving business success.

What career will this programme prepare me for?

  • Lead generation specialist

  • Sales representative

  • Business development manager

  • Marketing manager

  • Email marketing manager

  • Sales operation manager

  • Inbound marketing specialist

  • Digital marketing consultant

There are extra advantages of taking the Leads generation and Sales conversion course at our institution. You will acquire the skills required for professional success, thanks to our knowledgeable instructors and hands-on learning style as well as the support we offer you every step of the way. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner, our curriculum is designed to cater to your needs. Plus, you’ll gain access to abundant resources and be a part of a vibrant community of learners and professionals. With all these resources and support, you’ll be well on your way to becoming a thriving Leads generation and Sales conversion expert

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Physical and Virtual Classes

You will participate in physical and live virtual classes that will provide a platform for discussions, question-and-answer sessions, and feedback. The classes are designed to be interactive, with students encouraged to ask questions and participate in group discussions.

Case Studies

You'll get to dive into real-life examples and case studies from the lead generation and sales conversion field. This will give you valuable insights and hands-on experience that you can use in your own work.

Projects

You'll work on campaigns that enable you to put the concepts you've learned into action. You'll create and optimize various marketing campaigns, receiving guidance and feedback from industry experts. By engaging in this process, you'll develop the confidence and abilities necessary to excel in the dynamic world of lead generation and sales conversion.

Interactive Quizzes

The program includes interactive quizzes that will test your understanding of the concepts and tools covered in each module. These quizzes are designed to be engaging and will provide instant feedback on the student's performance.

What You Will Learn

Our course is specifically designed to prepare you with the knowledge and skills necessary to thrive in the ever-changing field of lead generation and sales conversion. You will engage in 10 modules that offer a captivating learning experience, delving into various aspects of effective lead generation and sales conversion strategies.

By the end of the course, you will possess the expertise to create, manage, and promote successful initiatives to acquire and convert customers.

  • Module 2

  • Access to a laptop or desktop computer with a minimum of 4gig ram, and 256g SSD or 500g HDD Rom.

  • Access to a stable internet connection

  • Proficiency in written and spoken English

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
